column4: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/KarmicUpgrades is not working for me :(  I've allegedly got all the updates...
any specific part that doesn't work for you? or you can't open the link in your browser?
when I got to update manager, and check for updates, it does not say I have an upgrade waiting
what version are you using now?
9.04 ubuntu
hmm.. no errors when you run the update?
no
can you pastebin the output of "sudo apt-get update" ?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/395809/
sudo apt-get update... not "sudo apt-get install update"
my bad :(
no worries
http://paste.ubuntu.com/395810/

if you run the update-manager and click the settings-button.. there might be a setting to only show new LTS releases.. or show all new releases.. can you see if you can find that? I think it's the same settings as "system, administration, software sources"
looking
unsupported and prereleased was not checking, so I'm re running the update manager via the gui
I also tried to do an update using the 9.10 cd that was not the alternative and that did not work.  Could that be the issue?
I don't think that should affect it.. not 100% sure though
I looked at the upgrade-page on ubuntu.com as well.. didn't see anything mentioned about problems upgrading from 9.04.. at least nothing like your issue
well it's installing the updates.  Maybe I should burn the alt cd and try that way incase it won't do it on it's own.
did you try the "Upgrading using the Alternate CD/DVD" that's mentioned here? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/KarmicUpgrades
thanks for the help.  I think I'm going to do a reinstall later.
I'm holding out for lucid lynx.. it's only a  month away or so
